MCQ: What is Generative AI focused on?
choice: a:Creating human-generated content | b:Enabling machines to produce content similar to human-generated information | c:Analyzing existing data patterns | d:Developing AI algorithms

MCQ: Which neural networks are commonly used in Generative AI?
choice: a:Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) | b:Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) | c:Support Vector Machines (SVMs) | d:Decision Trees

MCQ: What is a key application of Generative AI in healthcare?
choice: a:Creating chatbots | b:Generating medical reports | c:Image and video generation | d:Data augmentation

MCQ: What distinguishes Generative AI from Discriminative AI?
choice: a:Generates new data based on learned patterns | b:Classifies input data into predefined classes | c:Focuses on content creation | d:Learn patterns in data for classification
